directions: In a large pot over medium high heat, combine the ground beef and onion and saute for 5 to 10 minutes, or until meat is browned and onion is tender; drain excess fat.
Next, stir in the beans, corn, tomatoes and green chile peppers, tomatoes and taco seasoning. Mix well, reduce heat to medium and allow to heat through, about 15 minutes.
ingredients: 1 (10 ounce) can diced tomatoes with green chile peppers
1 (14.5 ounce) can peeled and diced tomatoes with juice
title: Taco Stew
